s.text: I haven't heard that he's not running, so I suppose I have to assume he isn't not running, which would be a shame since he was such a great non-candidate ...
He said all he's doing, in fact, is reminding people of bedrock liberal positions that seem to have been forgotten along the way.
He said all he's doing, in fact, is reminding people of bedrock liberal positions that seem to have been forgotten along the way.
